name: The Legendary Sickle of Duremas (2h)
data: It has superb weapon class for its type (impressive in general).
It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'brawl'.
This item loses its magical powers with incredible haste.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'dirty blow'.
